text.__SUMMARY__: Solanum paralum is a species of plant in the family Solanaceae. It is endemic to Brazil.
text.Sources: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Solanum paralum". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T35471A9934399. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T35471A9934399.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
